summary.span: 命名空間包含可用來自行撰寫交易應用程式和資源管理員的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that allow you to write your own transactional application and resource manager.

summary.span: 具體而言，您可以建立並參與擁有一個或多個參與者的交易 (本機或分散式)。

span.span: Specifically, you can create and participate in a transaction (local or distributed) with one or multiple participants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 您只可以建立使用此命名空間，在 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows 2003 平台應用程式。You can only create applications using this namespace under the Windows 2000, Windows XP and Windows 2003 platforms. 建立交易，以在 Windows 98 和 Windows ME 平台會擲回。Creating a transaction under the Windows 98 and Windows ME platforms throws a . 基礎結構可讓異動程式設計既簡單又有效率整個平台所支援的 SQL Server、 ADO.NET、 MSMQ，與 Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC) 在起始的異動。The infrastructure makes transactional programming simple and efficient throughout the platform by supporting transactions initiated in SQL Server, ADO.NET, MSMQ, and the Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC). 它提供的明確程式設計模型根據類別，以及隱含程式設計模型使用，交易自動管理基礎結構的類別。It provides both an explicit programming model based on the class, as well as an implicit programming model using the class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure. 強烈建議您開發使用隱含模型更容易。It is highly recommended that you use the easier implicit model for development. 若要開始使用，請參閱[實作隱含交易使用交易範圍](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ddba95e-7587-48b2-8838-708c275e7199)主題。To get started, please see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ddba95e-7587-48b2-8838-708c275e7199) topic. 如需撰寫交易應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on writing a transactional application, see . 也會提供您實作資源管理員的類型。 also provides types for you to implement a resource manager. 交易管理員可以使用原生動態資源或認可或回復有效率地為單一永久性資源登記，可讓基礎結構。The transaction manager native to the infrastructure allows volatile resources or a single durable resource enlistment to commit or roll back efficiently. 如需實作資源管理員的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作資源管理員](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on implementing a resource manager, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 交易管理員也會明確地呈報本機交易的分散式交易協調透過如 DTC 磁碟為基礎的交易管理員，當其他長期的資源管理員本身與交易登記。The transaction manager also transparently escalates local transactions to distributed transactions by coordinating through a disk-based transaction manager like the DTC, when an additional durable resource manager enlists itself with a transaction. 基礎結構提供兩個提高效能的重要方法。There are two key ways that the infrastructure provides enhanced performance. - 動態擴大，這表示基礎結構只涉及 MSDTC，實際需要的交易時。Dynamic Escalation, which means that the infrastructure only engages the MSDTC when it is actually required for a transaction. 這個區域所涵蓋的深度[交易管理擴大](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7)主題。This area is covered in depth in the [Transaction Management Escalation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7) topic. - 可提升登記，可讓資源 (例如資料庫) 取得異動的擁有權 (如果該資源是參與異動之唯一實體 (Entity) 的話)。Promotable Enlistments, which allows a resource, such as a database, to take ownership of the transaction if it is the only entity participating in the transaction. 稍後，若有需要基礎結構仍然可以提升到 MSDTC 交易的管理。Later, if needed, the infrastructure can still escalate the management of the transaction to MSDTC. 這會進一步減少 MSDTC 的使用。This further reduces the chance of using the MSDTC. 這個區域所涵蓋的深度[最佳化使用單一階段認可，並可提升單一階段通知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb)主題。This area is covered in depth in the [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb) topic. 定義三個層級的信任，以限制存取的資源會公開型別。 defines three levels of trust that restrict access on the types of resources it exposes. 具體來說，可由部分信任程式碼呼叫組件，因為已標記為與`AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers`屬性 (APTCA)。Specifically, the assembly can be called by partially trusted code as it has been marked with the `AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers` attribute (APTCA). 這個屬性基本上會移除 使用權限集合的隱含 `FullTrust` (在每個型別的每個公開存取方法上，都會自動放置這個隱含使用權限)。This attribute essentially removes the implicit for the `FullTrust` permission set that is otherwise automatically placed on each publicly accessible method in each type. 然而，部分型別和成員仍舊需要更強勢的使用權限。However, some types and members still require stronger permissions. 下列類型的清單，成員不是可由呼叫部分信任的程式碼，因為它們會裝飾使用下列的宣告式安全性屬性：The following is a list of types and members that are not callable by partially trusted code because they are decorated with the following declarative security attribute: `PermissionSetAttribute(SecurityAction.LinkDemand, Name := "FullTrust")` System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurableSystem.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhaseSystem.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase System.Transactions.TransactionInteropSystem.Transactions.TransactionInterop System.Transactions.TransactionManager.DistributedTransactionStartedSystem.Transactions.TransactionManager.DistributedTransactionStarted System.Transactions.TransactionManager.HostCurrentTransactionCallbackSystem.Transactions.TransactionManager.HostCurrentTransactionCallback System.Transactions.TransactionManager.ReenlistSystem.Transactions.TransactionManager.Reenlist System.Transactions.TransactionManager.RecoveryCompleteSystem.Transactions.TransactionManager.RecoveryComplete System.Transactions.TransactionScope.TransactionScope (System.Transactions.Transaction,System.TimeSpan,System.Transactions.EnterpriseServicesInteropOption)System.Transactions.TransactionScope.TransactionScope (System.Transactions.Transaction,System.TimeSpan,System.Transactions.EnterpriseServicesInteropOption) M:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.TransactionScope(System.Transactions.TransactionScopeOption,System.Transactions.TransactionOptions,System.Transactions.EnterpriseServicesInteropOption)M:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.TransactionScope(System.Transactions.TransactionScopeOption,System.Transactions.TransactionOptions,System.Transactions.EnterpriseServicesInteropOption) 如需各種信任層級，請參閱[安全性中存取資源的信任層級](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e45acbc-0d81-4f64-9da7-8f766aebff51)。For more information on the various trust levels, see [Security Trust Levels in Accessing Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e45acbc-0d81-4f64-9da7-8f766aebff51). 核心開發技術 Access\Transaction Processing\\Core Development Technologies\Data Access\Transaction Processing\\ 如需有關如何使用命名空間中，您可以查閱概念文件[交易處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac1637bf-4032-493b-a4e8-0380e54f82f9)下 「 核心開發技術 Access\Transaction 處理\\」 文件中的章節。For more information on how to use the namespace, you can consult the conceptual documentation [Transaction Processing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac1637bf-4032-493b-a4e8-0380e54f82f9), located under the "Core Development Technologies\Data Access\Transaction Processing\\" section in the documentation. 具體來說，您可以在下列主題中找到詳細資訊。Specifically, you can find more information in the following topics. [System.Transactions 所提供的功能Features Provided By System.Transactions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99cc5ce0-b7fd-4d78-a553-a3dd3f17ed45) [實作資源管理員Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)
